*[[Lucky Egg#Shops|Shops]] *[[Lucky Egg#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Lucky Egg''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily boosts the player's experience for 30 seconds. == Details == The Lucky Egg provides a +50% Bonus to experience gained. ==Acquisition== ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Battle items}}
